```{python}
run_db = duckdb.connect('run-metrics.duckdb', read_only=True)
```

## Random Split Performance



### Rating Prediction Accuracy

```{python}
rnd_rmse = run_db.query('''
SELECT model, config, AVG(user_rmse) AS user_rmse FROM metrics
WHERE split = 'random' AND user_rmse IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY model, config
''').to_df()
```

```{python}
(
    pn.ggplot(rnd_rmse)
    + pn.aes(x='model', y='user_rmse', fill='config')
    + pn.geom_col(position='dodge')
    + pn.scale_fill_brewer('qual', 'Dark2')
)
```


### Top-N Recommendation Accuracy

```{python}
rnd_topn = run_db.query('''
SELECT model, config, AVG(ndcg) AS ndcg, AVG(mrr) AS mrr FROM metrics
WHERE split = 'random'
GROUP BY model, config
''').to_df()
```

```{python}
(
    pn.ggplot(rnd_topn)
    + pn.aes(x='model', y='ndcg', fill='config')
    + pn.geom_col(position='dodge', )
    + pn.scale_fill_brewer('qual', 'Dark2')
    + pn.coord_flip()
)
```
